    Class AsyncRelayCommand

    A reusable command that encapsulates the implementation of System.Windows.Input.ICommand with support for async/await. Enables instant creation of an ICommand without implementing the ICommand interface for each command. The AsyncRelayCommand accepts asynchronous command handlers. System.Windows.Input.ICommand

    Namespace: BionicCode.Utilities.Net.Framework.Wpf

    Syntax
    public class AsyncRelayCommand : AsyncRelayCommand<object>, IAsyncRelayCommand<object>, IAsyncRelayCommand, ICommand
    Remarks

    AsyncRelayCommand implements System.Windows.Input.ICommand. In case System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object) is invoked with a registered asynchronous command handler (e.g., by an implementation of System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource), the handler is executed asynchronously. In case the AsyncRelayCommand is executed explicitly, especially with an asynchronous command handler registered, it is highly recommended to invoke the awaitable ExecuteAsync(object) or one of its overloads instead!
